public class CommonNodeLocator

Description copied from interface: INodeLocator
locates the INode

Specified by:
locate in interface INodeLocator
Parameters:
sourceService - the service to which the requesting client belongs to
sourceClient - the client that wants to locate some node
location - the location of the node that should be located
Returns:
the node (which may be local or a proxy of a remote node)
